text:
A single variable measured over time is referred to as a univariate time series. Univariate means
one variate or one variable. Multiple variables measured over time is referred to as a multivariate
time series: multiple variates or multiple variables.
 Univariate: One variable measured over time.
 Multivariate: Multiple variables measured over time.
Are you working on a univariate or multivariate time series problem?
